website_summaries.verdict: A classic drugstore foundation with plenty of shades to match your exact skin tone.
pros: Features 45 shades in cool, neutral, and warm tones
Blends easily and gives a natural finish with light to medium coverage
cons: Causes breakouts for some with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Staple
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both use the L'Oreal Paris Makeup True Match Super-Blendable Liquid Foundation, Natural Beige W4. We have Asian combination skin. This particular foundation absolutely great with coverage. She has post inflammatory erythema and the True Match Foundation does a great job at covering up redness and evening out her complexion. We haven't had a problem with the foundation caking. The great thing about this product is that you don't need to use a lot of product for coverage. Each bottle will last for quite some time and it has SPF in it!
customer_reviews.author: Linjumimom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I never wear foundation, but wanted to use a nice foundation as sunscreen, since the tinted sunscreens for the face have limited shades. This one has a billion shades, and SPF17!!! So I tried this and love it! It blends well over my other skin care products and looks natural and dewy. I love how easily it blends! I am 64 with good skin, and this foundation is my newest and favorite sunscreen for the face!
customer_reviews.author: Sneakypie

customer_reviews.title: Demi matte foundation
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is great for people that want a semi matte look. This foundation won’t make you look completely matte but it’s not dewy either. I love this for everyday use or if I’m traveling because the packaging is small and doesn’t take up a lot of space. This foundation line has a lot of shades and I hope everyone can find their shade and try it out. Its 2018 and this foundation is still poppin
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: It's a great foundation! It has full coverage but feels very ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great foundation! It has full coverage but feels very light on the skin so it's great for the summer. I was very happy with the coverage and quality of the foundation. The only reason I gave this foundation four stars is because I am simply a person who prefers foundation that has a very thick texture. I also found the foundation to be messy and hard to get out of the bottle without making a mess since the texture is a bit watery and it does not have a pump. Other than those two things it's a great foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kara C Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best store bought foundation on the market!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite foundation in the world! I’ve been using it for years. I’ve tried so many others and been disappointed every single time. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation for people with almost no acne marks.
customer_reviews.text: It is light to medium coverage and it looks so natural. When using this foundation I feel like I’m not wearing anything of how light it feels but I still get to feel confident that my skin will look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best match
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy foundation online just because I didnt know if it would be my shade. Once it arrived and I tested it out it was really the perfect match and applies easily as if im not even wearing any makeup at all. really pleased with the over all results and will most likely be ordering the same foundation from now on.
customer_reviews.author: nicole wojo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried this product and I like it very much. Goes on smooth and lasts longer than some make up I have tried. Covers age spots. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great medium coverage foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation- my all time fave is Armani, but this is a great inexpensive foundation. Never looks cakey, good coverage while still looking natural. I wear the shade W-4, and for reference I’m usually an NC35 in MAC.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine8787

customer_reviews.title: Super blendable
customer_reviews.text: Super blending with my skin . It last long on my skin like whole day. Very good for parties. Natural looking but you need to find the correct match for tour skin they’ve got wide range of shades
customer_reviews.author: Durga

customer_reviews.title: Very moist
customer_reviews.text: Love the look it gives to my face , it’s moist and it mix into your skin tone very well not marks or dryness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal True Match Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for years. The color is perfect. The amount of coverage is perfect. Not too heavy. Not too light. I feel as if the product makes my skin look and feel younger. This is my favorite foundation and I have used a lot of foundations. I use either a foundation brush or a cosmetic sponge to apply this foundation. Either way works fine with this foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Wipf

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive foundation that goes on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: For being drugstore makeup this has a nice feel and goes on easily and blends easily. It definitely is a shade or 2 lighter on the face than it appears in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O

customer_reviews.title: Too pale!
customer_reviews.text: This is very very light colored! I suggest going a few shades darker! And I'm not dark complected
customer_reviews.author: diane stegemoller

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a little more "watery" than I expected but other than that I love it. It says nothing on the label about enhancing glow but my face definitely glows when I apply this makeup. I don't have to use any highlighter. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Foundation EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this exact foundation for years and I just can’t bring myself to switch to another. Not only is this perfect for my sensitive skin, but the finish of this foundation is simply flawless and beautifully natural. A lot of people compliment me on my skin and it’s truly due to this foundation — it is so easy to work with, and the price isn’t bad at all for the wonderful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Delightful surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because I like Loreal but more often than not when I buy it in the store I end up having to take it back becaue the color is not right. Sight unseen going only by my comptuter and the descriptions I got the right shade. I am delighted and hope to have future good experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: This is a product I used many years ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I used many years ago and came back to after years of using more expensive makeup that didn't work as well. For the price you can't beat L"Oreal Paris cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the coverage and it really minimizes lines and pores
customer_reviews.author: Donna Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This foundation feels like I am not wearing any. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: It really is super blendable and applies really well
customer_reviews.text: Literally, the only foundation that matches my skin tone and accounts for the undertone. It really is super blendable and applies really well. Totally would recommend and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Asma Hussain

customer_reviews.title: I used Clinique foundation for 15 years. At about ...
customer_reviews.text: I used Clinique foundation for 15 years. At about $25 per bottle, I couldn't justify spending that amount with other substitutes available. I was very impressed by this product, and will definitely reorder. I wore Clinique - Alabaster.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: I do enjoy this foundation very much but unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy this foundation very much but unfortunately, my t-zone takes over after about 3 hours and the make up starts to distort on my nose due to my natural oils....so, keep the powder handy if you have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: axo girl

customer_reviews.title: A must have product for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in my make up bag. It goes on smoothly, does not blotch, stays on for the day and generally does match the tone of my skin which definitely needs a foundation make up. I always seek out this brand and color as it truly works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A.

customer_reviews.title: Watery, it’s ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty watery. Color doesn’t match well. Had to buy a lighter color and mix the two.
customer_reviews.author: ali tippytapper

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and it stays on your face all day until you wash it off. I love how it's not too thick and just pours right into your hand without any hassel. I'll be buy more of this when I run out. And next time I'll try lighter colors since the one I got made me a little tanner than usual, but I blend that with other makeup as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney Rose

customer_reviews.title: The only foundation that matches my skin color
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation! It looks very natural and blends very well
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: ... I just want a little too light but I love the way it
customer_reviews.text: So many colors to choose from I just want a little too light but I love the way it works
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pellicano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear foundation everyday, but this gets the job done perfectly for my special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites...
customer_reviews.text: L'Oreal is one of my favorite affordable brands for foundations. I was ecstatic to find this foundation for just a few dollars! The coverage level is just right and the foundation doesn't seem to heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice make-up for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used L'Oreal make-up for years and am very happy with it. Same company that manufactures many other high end cosmetics. Provides nice even coverage; not too little or too much.
customer_reviews.author: MTgirl

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite!!! So glad, that i have tried it. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Aniri Noslo

customer_reviews.title: It is one of my new favorite make up stuffs
customer_reviews.text: It is one of my new favorite make up stuffs. I am an Asian and W4 is perfect for my skin color. It does not feel heavy at all. not even cakey looking. I want to see if the result looks better with True Match Powder!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Very Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and it sit on my skin perfectly :) However, I have not test it with going out and having on my skin for a long time. If I didn't like it, I will rewrite my review :)
customer_reviews.author: Nilou

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: Silky, without being oily . A very small quantity is needed. I use it with a face powder.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This had high reviews everywhere but, sadly, broke me out

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. I have been using it for 5 years. For a little money, it goes a long way...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. The Natural Beige is perfect for a lighter skin tone.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and perfect
customer_reviews.text: the products were perfect and came even early! Everything works perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great foundation for oily and combination skin, with medium coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mihaela M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect makeup for me! Covers small imperfections and stays on all day! I have used this product for a long time and plan to keep on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Feet!

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Color on website is the color you get! I ordered the color natural beige and it was my exact skin Tone! Not caked and blends really good on my skin! Looked fresh even after 6 hours and I have ance prone - oily skin but it didn't bother or irritate it at all. No smell and it doesn't feel like anything is on your face. Very moisturizing. Would purchase again. Gives a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: Yota

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent product; I have been using it for at least 4 to 5 years. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador clan

customer_reviews.title: nice coverage and not greasy
customer_reviews.text: covers nicely and not greasy, looks natural, doesn't aggravate my rosacea skin, W4 color is perfect for light olive toned skin.

customer_reviews.title: i love it, the coverage is medium to high
customer_reviews.text: i love it,the coverage is medium to high, im nc30 in MAC and W4 is perfect for me , good for everyday use feel like skin ,need to set with powder, last for 6 Hour UP to 8 with primer
customer_reviews.author: Reemlittle R.

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this foundation for many years. It matches perfectly, goes on nice, can't complain at all.

customer_reviews.title: This foundation is perfect for daily use as it has medium coverage
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is perfect for daily use as it has medium coverage. It's a long wear makeup that stay for around 6 houres so when I put it in the morning, it's still the same in the evening. The color I choose was w4 and its just perfect for me. It gave me bright, shiny and fresh face appearance. I liked it.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a little more yellowy that i expected but otherwise covers well and still feels light

customer_reviews.title: Thought I ordered a different color?
customer_reviews.text: I like the makeup very much. However, I thought I ordered NUDE Beige, but I received NATURAL Biege. I've been making it work by mixing the old with the new, but I did want the other color.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Phariss

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal Makeup Purchase
customer_reviews.text: couldn't find this anywhere in town, ordered it online and it came a few days earlier than amazon's estimated time of arrival.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dana Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I like my Maybelline liquid make up more than this
customer_reviews.text: I like my Maybelline liquid make up more than this. This is light weight that the other one which is good. But it needs two applications to cover the imperfections on my face. I am satisfied but not very excited! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gudb

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this in time, Nice Make up. it looks too real on skin, love it. The colour is perfect and natural. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this product is interesting and good product. good factory. this product help for complete anything. is important have this product

customer_reviews.title: Send me wrong product
customer_reviews.text: i ordered Natural Beige of 4 bottles but received "warm". they wasted my money. This is for my mother who lives in abroad and product was shipped to her. When she used it told the color was too light. She told it was not natural beige. I should have checked the product without trusting them. It is too expensive to ship them back to me. I lost my money and this is the last time purchase from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: puretea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well this matched my skin tone, I just started using foundation and heard great things about this one on YouTube. Glad I picked it. It makes my skin look great.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it matches my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found my foundation!!!! I love the way it matches my skin, even though I ordered it online. I think I could go just a bit lighter, but it works really well. If I go lighter it may be too light, so I'm going to get a foundation mixer to use with other foundations I have that is too dark and I may put a tadbit in this to lighten it up a tad. I probably wont use it with this one, I think I can make it work!!! Love it and the undertone is right! I suggest this for anyone who wants a lighter feeling foundation, but wants good coverage at the same time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Howard  Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to cover some imperfections on my face and it works for me really well. I can’t speak for anybody else but I like how liquid it is and it goes on my face like a lotion would. Very easy to use. It doesn’t really last that long though. So you will need to reapply in the afternoon. But really no big deal. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really know my shade, just knew I was darker than light beige so I went with natural beige and it worked perfectly! It's not full coverage but it's still pretty good. Only saying this because I have freckles and they weren't completely covered. Easy to apply, super blendable.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good for the drugstore!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The best way to apply in my opinion is with my fingers and then blend in with my beauty blender. I am nw20 and n2 seems to be a good match.
customer_reviews.author: ERyser

customer_reviews.title: Every women likes to look beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I use makeup very rarely but if I go to some special places. But not day by day basis. But when you wear it it makes you feel beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Pop

customer_reviews.title: Get the right tone
customer_reviews.text: This foundation has really good coverage and is very matte.. Great if you find the perfect color for you, the only thing i didn't like is that it dries completely and you kind of feel it in your face, feels kind of heavy.. A tip: be careful with the warm tones, they have A LOT of yellow on them. I have a yellow undertone and i don't exactly love it, but i thought the logic was to get a warm tone.. it fits terrible makes me look darker and more yellow, but that was my mistake. Will be buying a neutral tone for sure next time to kind of correct the yellow instead of empowering it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has SHIMMER.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it zero stars if I could. I was wondering why my face was shimmery and I thought it was my brushes when I realized they added SHIMMER to this formula. I tried it a couple years back and it had zero shimmer. It was matte, but recently I noticed the bottle I ordered had added shimmer. I am so upset... they killed a perfectly good foundation.
customer_reviews.author: F22494

customer_reviews.title: price is good too! I wish they offer the color sampler ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my every day foundation! I have sensitive skin, but never had irritation or any trouble with it. price is good too! I wish they offer the color sampler so I can try other colors too!

customer_reviews.title: Very dark

Before buying this foundation I was using a powder foundation, but my face will get dry!. This is my first time using a liquid foundation, I really like it because it does not make my face oily.

customer_reviews.text: I don't have allergies of any kind but this gave me hives. Might be good for others though.

customer_reviews.text: I have super oily skin, so nothing lasts all day on my grease ball face. This applies really nice, leaves an airbrush finish (when I use my beauty junkees makeup brush). I really like it, but it's not something I would wear for a special occasion. It can get shiny pretty quickly.

customer_reviews.title: good product

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Makeup True Match Super-Blendable Liquid Foundation, Natural Beige W4, 1 Fl Oz,1 Count
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Color:W4 Natural BeigeWith patented color technology, L'Oreal Paris True Match Super-Blendable Foundation precisely matches your skin's tone and undertone and coordinates perfectly with True Match Powder, Blush, and Concealer. Formulated with Precise Match Technology to provide the most natural true-to-you coverage. Ultra-pure formula contains no oils, fragrances, or pore-clogging fillers, so all you see is beautiful, radiant, flawless skin. The super blendable foundation contains SPF 19 to protect skin while providing light to medium coverage with a natural finish. With Vitamins A and C, wheat germ and grape fruit extract to keep your skin nourished, protected and healthy. Finish: Natural SPF: 17 (select shades). Coverage: Light to medium coverage foundation. Skin Type: For all skin types. Oil-free

BRAND STORY
By L'Oreal Paris
feature_bullets: TRUE MATCH FOUNDATION provides medium coverage with a natural finish so blendable it’s like you can’t tell where your foundation ends and your skin begins. True Match matches skin’s undertone for a true to skin result

OIL FREE FOUNDATION WITH SPF: Apply with fingers, makeup sponge, or foundation brush, starting at the center of the face and blending toward the jaw and hairline. Free of oils and fragrances, and won’t clog pores

THE FOUNDATION OF YOUR LOOK: From natural to full coverage, L'Oréal Paris face makeup has what you need for a smooth, even finish. Highlight to illuminate, use concealer to hide imperfections or use contouring makeup for enhanced, defined features

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oreal Paris Makeup helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eye shadow palettes, lipsticks and much more

PERFECT TO PAIR WITH: L'Oreal Paris True Match Super Blendable Multi Use Concealer. The concealer's lightweight formula minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and brightens dull, tired skin
